question: Recently, veterinarians performed a rare operation on a â€˜Moray eel in which Indian state?
explanation:
Recently, veterinarians performed a rare operation on a moray eel in Thiruvananthapuram Zoo in Kerala, one of the oldest zoos in the country. This is the first time a surgery has been done ish has been operated on in the Indian zoos.
Moray eel is a family of marine and brackish water eels (elongated ray-finned fishes) that occur throughout the world.
